title: How do I go about appealing a ban?
body:
Hey there!

I was looking for some help, I recently have been unable to get into games because of this problem here; 

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/zgUdmTen-firewall-errorblack-screen-after-champion-select

It happened the first time and I freaked out and done everything (including a restart and redownload of the latest patch) but still couldn't get in. The second I had done a complete re-install of the game and it happened again. I got a warning and was placed in a low priority queue. I only just realised that they actually posted something on here about it. But essentially I done everything except what it says in that link. 

I don't really care I lost LP. I'm just a bit annoyed that I ruined my teams games by unintentionally being afk. I'm not very good at LoL, but I at least have respect and always try my best. And it's a little annoying I have to wait 5 mins to play a game now zz. 

TL;DR

What happens to me now I'm in a low priority queue>?
